name: Workshop: Introduction to ZK #1
description:
ZK beginners are invited to join us for our first Intro to ZK workshop on Sunday afternoon, from 4 - 6PM.

A series of introductory lectures and/or hands-on workshops, open to all participants with technical background. Intro to cryptography introduces some cryptography math, intro to ETH introduces blockchains, intro to ZK introduces zero-knowledge and circom
